roleset.name: ring to announce

example.name: All args
example.text: Funeral and wedding bells knelled important passages in the lives of individuals.
example.arg: important passages in the lives of individuals.

example.name: All args
example.text: It was more of a wake than a party since it knelled the end of the beaver trade.
example.arg: the end of the beaver trade.
